#### Chapter 1 
``` {r results = "asis", echo = F}
cols = bases %>% subset(!is.na(Base)) %>% pull(variable)
 
for(i in cat_1){
  lab = dict2[dict2$variable == i,]$variable_label
  if(i %in% cols){
    k <- print.cat.from.bases(i)} else {
      k <- print.cat(i)
    } 
  
  j = if(is_empty(lab)){i} else{lab}
        print(k %>% 
              kbl(caption = paste0("Results for: ", j)) %>%
              kable_styling())
  
}

```
